error_signature: Sync Timeout: PSS not found in NR mode
solution_text: Increase the synchronization search window size and enable accumulation over multiple frames.

error_signature: Demodulation Error: EVM too high in 16QAM
solution_text: Switch to a more robust Modulation and Coding Scheme (MCS) or enable frequency offset correction.

error_signature: Handover Failure: Target cell signal weak
solution_text: Trigger measurement report earlier or lower the handover threshold (A3 event).
Adjust CCA (Clear Channel Assessment) threshold to avoid false alarms.
